ack.p: Disclaimer: The views expressed in this paper are those of the authors and do not necessarily represent the position of Zimbabwe’s Ministry of Health & Child Welfare, Zimbabwe’s National AIDS Council, CHAI Avenir Health, Imperial College London, the Institute for Disease Modeling, the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, or other affiliated organizations.

We thank Prof. Laith Abu Raddad (Weill Cornell Medical College, Doha, Qatar) and Drs. Anna Bershteyn and Adam Akullian (Institute for Disease Modeling, Seattle, WA, USA) for modeling contributions in initial stages of the project. We thank the USAID DMPPT team, led by Dr. Emmanuel Njeuhmeli, for providing district-level targets of the VMMC program, and Prof. Simon Gregson (Imperial College London) and Maaya Sundaram (Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation) for helpful advice throughout the study.
